titleStmt.title: Devol's last farewel: containing an account of many frolicksom intreigues [sic] and notorius robbers which he committed: concluding with his mournful lamentation, on the day of his death. To the tune of, Upon the change.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of originals in: University of Glasgow Library and British Library.
